lbl.ButtonTextDescription: The text displayed on the button
lbl.ColorDescription: The colour variant of the button (PRIMARY, SUCCESS, INFO, WARNING, DANGER, DEFAULT)
lbl.Description: The theme-button component is a versatile button with various colour variations and options. It can be used to create interactive elements in the application.
lbl.IconEndDescription: If true, the icon is displayed after the text.
lbl.Title: Button

lbl.Description: The theme-button-bar component displays a horizontal group of buttons, typically used for form actions or navigation controls.
lbl.Title: Button Bar

lbl.Description: The theme-card component is a container for grouping related content. It provides a clean, organized way to display information with optional inverted styling.
lbl.InvertedDescription: When true, applies inverted color scheme to the card
lbl.Title: Card

lbl.Description: The theme-checkbox-group component is a flexible checkbox group with different colour variations. It can be used to create multiple selectable options in the application.
lbl.LabelDescription: The text displayed in the checkbox
lbl.Title: Checkbox

lbl.Description: This page shows the available color variations in the theme system. Colors with variables offer shades (darker variations) and tints (lighter variations) for flexible design.
lbl.Title: Colors

lbl.Description: The theme-dialog component is a modal dialog window for important user interactions. The DialogService is used to open dialogs programmatically.
lbl.OpenDescription: Opens a dialog with the specified component and configuration
lbl.Title: Dialog

lbl.Description: The theme-dropdown-select component is a flexible dropdown select field with keyboard navigation and automatic popup alignment. It supports any value type through generics.
lbl.DisabledDescription: Disables the dropdown field or individual options
lbl.OptionsDescription: Array of available options to select from
lbl.PlaceholderDescription: Placeholder text displayed when no option is selected
lbl.SelectedDescription: The currently selected option or null
lbl.Title: Dropdown Select

lbl.Description: Die theme-footer Komponente zeigt einen kleinen Footer-Bereich mit Copyright-Text und Ã¼bersetzten Beschriftungen an.
lbl.Title: Footer

lbl.Description: The theme-header component displays the header section of the application with navigation menu support.
lbl.MenuItemsDescription: Array of menu items to display in the header navigation
lbl.Title: Header

lbl.Description: The fast-svg component enables the display of SVG icons from the icon set. All available icons are shown here.
lbl.Title: Icon

lbl.AltDescription: Alternative text for the image (required for accessibility)
lbl.Description: The theme-image-loader component provides lazy loading, responsive images with automatic srcset generation, placeholder support, and error handling.
lbl.SrcDescription: The source URL of the image to load
lbl.Title: Image Loader

lbl.Description: The theme-input component is a form input field with floating labels, icon support, and validation integration.
lbl.DisabledDescription: When true, disables the input field
lbl.IconDescription: Optional icon to display inside the input field
lbl.LabelDescription: The label text for the input field
lbl.PlaceholderDescription: Placeholder text shown when the field is empty
lbl.Title: Input
lbl.TypeDescription: The HTML input type (text, email, password, etc.)

lbl.Description: The theme-language-toggle component allows users to switch between available languages (English and German) with a visual flag indicator.
lbl.Title: Language Toggle

lbl.Description: The theme-login component provides a complete login form with email and password validation, integrated with the DataConnectionService for authentication.
lbl.FormDescription: Reactive form group containing email and password controls with validation
lbl.LoginMethodDescription: Handles the login action when the form is valid and submits credentials
lbl.Title: Login

lbl.Description: The theme-range-input component provides a two-input range selector with from and to values, integrated with ControlValueAccessor for Reactive Forms support.
lbl.FormControlDescription: FormControl instance for managing the range input value
lbl.LabelDescription: Label text displayed above the range input
lbl.Title: Range Input
lbl.ValueChangeDescription: Output emitter fired when the range value changes

lbl.Description: The theme-select component is a dropdown select field with support for single and multi-select, custom labels, and dynamic layout.
lbl.FormControlDescription: FormControl instance for managing the select value
lbl.IsDynamicDescription: When true, enables dynamic layout behavior
lbl.LabelDescription: Label text displayed above the select field
lbl.OptionsDescription: Array of SelectOption objects with label and value properties
lbl.Title: Select

lbl.ActiveTabDescription: The index of the currently active tab
lbl.Description: The theme-tabs component displays multiple tab panels with clickable tab headers for switching between different content sections.
lbl.TabsDescription: Array of tab items with label and content properties
lbl.ThemeTabDescription: Individual tab within the tab group with label input
lbl.Title: Tabs

lbl.Description: The theme-textarea component is a multi-line text input field with floating labels and validation support.
lbl.IsDynamicDescription: When true, enables dynamic label behavior
lbl.LabelDescription: The label text for the textarea
lbl.PlaceholderDescription: Placeholder text shown when the field is empty
lbl.Title: Textarea

lbl.Description: The themeTooltip directive displays a tooltip when users hover over an element. It can be applied to any HTML element.
lbl.Title: Tooltip
lbl.TooltipTextDescription: The text to be displayed inside the tooltip

lbl.Content: Only available on LeafItem<T>. Stores any type of data (string, number, object, etc.)
lbl.Description: The TreeView component displays a hierarchical tree structure with folders and files. It supports nested folders, file content of any type, and emits the selected item on click.
lbl.Expanded: Only available on FolderItem. Controls whether folder children are visible. Set to false for collapsed folders.
lbl.Items: Array of folder and file items. Items must be typed with LeafItem<T> or FolderItem using satisfies operator.
lbl.SelectedItem: Emits when a folder or file item is clicked. Returns the entire item object.
lbl.Title: Tree View

lbl.Description: Overview of the available typography styles in the theme system. Use these CSS classes for consistent text formatting in your application.
lbl.Title: Typography
